section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Justice William J. Brennan, Jr.

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: The disposition of 73-846, Wingo against Wedding will be announced by Mr. Justice Brennan.

turn.speaker: william_j_brennan_jr
turn.label: Justice William J. Brennan, Jr.
turn.text: In this case, the Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit held that the District judges must personally conduct evidentiary hearings in federal habeas corpus cases and are not authorize -- and may not authorize full-time federal magistrates to hold such evidentiary hearings for them.
The Chief Justice has filed a dissenting opinion in which Mr. Justice White has joined.
